thread.title: Shouting match, threat of lawsuit follows vote on Cleveland's dirt bike track proposal
thread.title_full: Shouting match, threat of lawsuit follows vote on Cleveland's dirt bike track proposal

author: Leila Atassi, cleveland.com
title: Shouting match, threat of lawsuit follows vote on Cleveland's dirt bike track proposal
text: A hearing Monday on the proposal to build a dirt bike track in Cleveland devolved into a shouting match and threats of legal action over whether the legislation was handled appropriately in council committees.
